title: Physical Resource
description: Gaia X defines a physical resources as a Physical Resource that inherits from a Resource. A Physical resource is, and not limited to, a datacenter, a baremetal service, a warehouse, a plant. Those are entities that have a weigth and position in our space. This is equivalent to the entity

id.description: Property. Unique identifier of the entity

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be PhysicalResource

ownedBy.description: Property. Attribute present in data model AgriGreenhouse of subject dataModel.Agrifood with the description Owner (Person or Organization) of the AgriGreenhouse. Attribute present in data model Animal of subject dataModel.Agrifood with the description The owner of the animal. Attribute present in data model AgriParcel of subject dataModel.Agrifood with the description Owner (Person or Organization) of the item. Attribute present in data model AgriFarm of subject dataModel.Agrifood with the description Owner (Person or Organization) of the farm.

category.description: Category of the concrete resource. e.g Gold, Silver for MSISDN concrete resource

endDate.description: A date time( DateTime). The date till the resource is effective

href.description: The URI for the object itself.

lifecycleState.description: The life cycle state of the resource.

name.description: A string used to give a name to the resource

startDate.description: A date time( DateTime). The date from which the resource is effective

version.description: A field that identifies the specific version of an instance of a resource.
